sen.j: 橘 以政（たちばな の もちまさ、生没年不詳）は、平安時代末期の官人。
sen.e: TACHIBANA no Mochimasa (date of birth and death unknown) was a government official (esp. one of low to medium rank) at the end of the Heian period.

sen.cmt: the sonの方が良いと思います。Mochinaga, the Chikugo no kuni no Kamiの方が読みやすいと思います。

sen.j: 橘以経・橘以輔・政舜の父。

sen.j: 蔵人･摂津国守・筑後国守・中宮亮などを歴任し、正四位下に至った。
sen.e: He had consecutively served as Kurodo (Chamberlain), Settsu no kuni no kami (governor of Settsu Province), Chikugo no kuni no Kami, Chugu no suke (Assistant Master of the Consort's Household) until he rose to the rank of Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
